title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: A friendship or association might be draining more of your emotions and resources now than energizing. This imbalanced dynamic can easily occur when youre interacting out of habit rather than paying attention to the full nature of the exchange. Although cutting someone off is the quickest way out, its not the kindest strategy. Perhaps the other person is oblivious to your feelings or going through a rough patch of some sort. Instead of assuming the worst, initiate an honest conversation about the health of your relationship. George Bernard Shaw wrote, The single biggest problem in communication is the illusion that it has taken place. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
